trends: There have been no other sightings in St Marys
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Green glowing right-angle upright triangle with rounded corners
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving my house to go to the library. I usually cut across my neighbor's lawn, but this time before I could leave my driveway, I noticed a humongous triangle (upright) hovering over the area. I froze. It did not move. There was no noise. It was glowing a dull green. I stared at it at last 10 minutes. I was afraid to move,ago to the house and get a camera. I finally turned to go get it, but as soon as I did it vanished with no noise or anything
